system.requirements: A Reletively Simple Summoning ritual design requiring a basic Chaos Shrine and minimal Preperation. It summons multiple lesser Daemons of no particular alignment, such as Warp Furies, Ebon Geists, Unclean Spirits, Nether Swarms, etc.
system.effect: A Single Lesser Daemon appears in the summoning area, +1 Daemon of the same type per additional Degree of Success on the Ritual Test (Up to Character's Willpower Bonus number of Daemons). They remain for 1d5 rounds, +1 round per additional Daemon summoned. f the veil between reality is thin, or the daemon is further empowered through slaughter it may stay for longer.  If the Daemon is summoned for a specific task, it remains long enough to complete it (within reason). A +20 Daemonic Mastery Test may be made to control all of the Daemons, with -10 to the test per Daemon after the first. that was summoned. These Daemons may be merged by the GM into a sigle Horde of lesser daemons, with each contributing 5 Magnitude to the Horde.
system.costs: Two Psychic Phenomena occur, add +10 to the rolls per Lesser Daemon summoned after the first.
system.failure: Contempt of the Warp Occurs, with +10 to the roll per Degree of Failiure on Ritual Test beyond the first.
